PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2001-05232001-03-300AGRI-FOOD,  TB,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisApproval to amend the TERMS and CONDITIONS of the SPRING CREDIT ADVANCE PROGRAM (a program designed to provide financial assistance to producers in the form of interest-free cash advances) by increasing (from $20,000 to $50,000) the amount that may be advanced to producers to finance the cost of planting their crops in 2000 and 2001.
Attachments
precis:
Approval to amend the TERMS and CONDITIONS of the SPRING CREDIT ADVANCE
PROGRAM (a program designed to provide financial assistance to producers
in the form of interest-free cash advances) by increasing (from $20,000 to
$50,000) the amount that may be advanced to producers to finance the cost
of planting their crops in 2000 and 2001.
